alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:59AM CDT until July 07 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR NORTHWESTERN SCOTTS BLUFF... SOUTHWESTERN SIOUX AND EAST CENTRAL GOSHEN COUNTIES WILL EXPIRE AT MIDNIGHT MDT... The storms which prompted the warning have weakened below severe limits, and no longer pose an immediate threat to life or property. Therefore, the warning will be allowed to expire. However small hail, gusty winds and heavy rain are still possible with these thunderstorms. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern Wyoming. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Cheyenne.
